<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Empathic Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=1115)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 93</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You forge a bond between yourself and the target, enabling you to feel each other's emotions. You and the target can communicate empathetically, sharing emotions, at a distance of up to 1 mile.

---
**Heightened (4th)**  You can target up to 4 willing creatures, and the duration increases to 8 hours.
name: Empathic Link
